p: PENK was downregulated in brain samples from 446 PWH compared to 67 HIV negative patients (Gelman et al. 2012). The subjects with HIV also expressed higher levels of interferon regulatory factor 1 ( IRF1) transcripts. The idea that higher opioid peptide expression levels are neuroprotective has been supported in human studies and experimental animal models (Solbrig and Koob 2004; Sarkisyan et al. 2015; Nam et al. 2019) suggesting the reductions in PENK expression are deleterious.
